project_descr: To assist Mexico in the preparation of its First Biennial Update Report (BUR) for the fullfilment of the obligations under the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)

donor_name:
INECC has the mission to generate scientific and technical information on environmental issues and the training of 
human resources, in order to inform society, support decision making, encourage the protection of the environment,
promote the sustainable use of natural resources, and support the Secretary of the Environment and Natural Resources
in reading its goals.
INECC's vision is to become a leader agency in applied environmental research, that develops and promotes scientific
cooperation projects that contribute effectively to resolve the major environmental problems of Maxico, and support
the conservation and restoration of the environment in the whole country.
outputs.output_descr: Assist Mexico to prepare its first Biennial Update Report (BUR) to the UNFCCC.To strengthen institutional capacity in integrating climate change national strategies into development priorities while fulfilling obligations to UNFCCC.

document_name: Cost Sharing Agreement INECC - Proyecto BUR resultado 3 y 5 firmado
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/MEX/Cost Sharing Agreement INECC - Proyecto BUR resultado 3 y 5 firmado.pdf
project_title: biennial update report 2014 to the unfccc
